message: Came back to the pub.
Gardner and Thomas seem to be getting drunk as usual.
I don't think this is the time to be hanging around and whining in a place like this...
このふたりは、すでに何かをする目的を失ってしまったのだろうか。

name: Cordelia
message: Sorry for the wait.
Cordelia changes into the bartender’s outfit she always wears inside the pub, and there’s booze for us on the tray in her left hand.

name: Thomas
message: Yo, you're pretty damn late, aren't ya.
Just because you're young doesn't mean you should push yourself too hard.

name: Gardner
message: I don't really mind, but wouldn't it be smarter to be back at the Fish Scale Inn by breakfast time?

name: Gardner
message: Wouldn't it be kinda rude to Mrs. Hudson, who went through all the trouble of preparing a meal for us?

name: Jonathan
message: I'm sorry.........

name: Thomas
message: Don't be so uptight.
These two aren't old folks like you, you know.

name: Thomas
message: It means I'm not at an age where I can hold myself back anymore.
It's his usual clueless look.
He doesn't really seem particularly flustered or anything......

name: Thomas
message: What's wrong？
You've been staring at my face for a while now.

name: Jonathan
message: 『The “good spot,』 where exactly is that supposed to be？

name: Thomas
message: そいつぁ行ってみてのお楽しみってやつだ。
You're not a kid, so hold it in until night.
私にナイといる所を見られたのがショックだったのだろうか、少しうろたえたように見える。

name: Thomas
message: Why the hell‥‥‥‥
Those suspicious eyes, you know.

name: Jonathan
message: 別に君を疑わなければならない理由などないがね。
どうしてナイと知り合いである事を私たちに隠してい　　　　　　　　たんだ？

name: Thomas
message: I told you, I don’t know anyone like that！

name: Jonathan
message: So then, what were you doing last night?
まさかあの教会に金目の物でもないかと、盗みに入っ　　　　　　　　た訳でもないだろう。

name: Thomas
message: Who would go to a shabby church like that.
たまたまだよ、あの野郎のいる前を通っただけだ。

name: Jonathan
message: Whoa......
あんな夜更けに外を出歩く用事とは何だったんだ。

name: Thomas
message: That's none of your damn business.

name: Jonathan
message: Then, it's no wonder people would think I went to the Church to see Nai.

name: Thomas
message: Tch...... Fine, I get it.
Tonight, I'll take you along too.

name: Jonathan
message: Where to?

name: Thomas
message: This is a nice place.
That's　all　I　can　say　for　now.
He still doesn't drop that clueless look.
Last night, it's like that furious look I had toward Nai in front of the Church was just a lie.
Even though it's still pretty early, I'm downing my Glass like I don't give a damn.
This guy doesn't seem to feel any guilt about getting drunk in the middle of the day.
He keeps glancing at me with a smug grin-probably fantasizing about me and Cordelia.
Even he seems to be a little shaken this time.
He might be used to seeing half-mummified corpses in graves, but it's probably the first time he's laid eyes on such a fresh, murdered body.
It's not like we don't feel any guilt at all that Marsh was killed because we were obsessively snooping around that old man.
You don't seem to have much energy.
She is older than me, so maybe all the exhaustion from the past few days is piling up on her.
Because yesterday's investigation revealed that the ruins weren't originally in Arkham but were actually fakes brought in by someone, they don't seem very energetic.

It seems they've lost the motivation to keep researching Arkham, but since we still don't know where those ruins came from or what they mean, I don't think the investigation is completely over yet......
No wonder you look so pale.
Sure, I get how you feel after witnessing such a brutal murder right in front of you.
But I can't leave you alone in the Gilman House either.
もしマーシュが殺された原因が私たちに協力していたからだとしたら、ひとりでいるのは危険すぎる。
Even if it's a stretch, it's safer to stay with us.
If I can help her relax, even just a little‥‥‥‥
She's not looking annoyed or anything, and she's carrying our drinks in her bartender outfit. The seductive body that was writhing beneath me last night is now hidden under that stoic uniform.
Looks like she's embarrassed to face Gardner and the others after our night together, as expected.
Even though there's a smile on their face, the expression is awkward.
I don't really think there's any need to worry, but it seems like it's hard to stay calm when you're being stared at curiously by two guys.

name: Jonathan
message: By the way, where did you go last night？

name: Thomas
message: Where, you ask？
I didn't really go anywhere.

name: Jonathan
message: But when I peeked into your room, you seemed to be out.
Why would you have any reason to leave your room that late at night?

name: Thomas
message: Well then......
He probably just went to the bathroom or something.

name: Jonathan
message: Oh...

name: Thomas
message: What the hell, you've been acting all suspicious of me for a while now.
Are you saying you can't believe what I'm telling you?

name: Jonathan
message: Well, that's right.
Because I saw you last night.

name: Thomas
message: What did you say？

name: Jonathan
message: In front of the church, you were talking to that black priest, Nai, right?

name: Thomas
message: ......You saw that？

name: Jonathan
message: I definitely saw it.
Just because it was dark, there's no way I mistook what I saw.

name: Thomas
message: So, what was I doing then?

name: Jonathan
message: Well, I was pretty far from you from where I was.
All I could tell was that you two were talking about something.

name: Jonathan
message: Were you and Nai acquaintances？
If that's the case, why did you keep it from us?

name: Thomas
message: It's not like we really know each other or anything.

name: Jonathan
message: Then, why were you meeting so late at night?
You must be hiding something shady from us！

name: Thomas
message: That's not true.
I'm not hiding anything.

name: Gardner
message: So now, we've lost any villagers willing to cooperate with us.

name: Jonathan
message: You mean the old man Marsh?

name: Gardner
message: How could anyone do such a terrible thing.
I can't believe someone in their right mind would do that.

name: Jonathan
message: Criminals tend to have abnormal minds to some degree, you know.

name: Gardner
message: Did you see the old man's body？
It's like it got ripped apart by a shark or something, isn't it?

name: Jonathan
message: It’s not like I actually got eaten or anything.
That's just way too abnormal.

name: Gardner
message: I'd like to think so.
I think it's a message from the culprit meaning, 'I'll eat you guys too.'

name: Jonathan
message: All I can do is hope that someone will give the old man's corpse a proper offering.

name: Gardner
message: Personally, I'm starting to want to leave this village as soon as possible. There's nothing to gain by staying here.

name: Jonathan
message: Professor, even knowing that the ruins are fake, will you still help me？

name: Gardner
message: Yeah, I've been thinking about it too.
I have no business in this village, but unfortunately, I don't have the guts to cross that suspension bridge.

name: Gardner
message: Doesn't look like anyone's coming to pick us up from outside...
In the end, I still can't leave this village for a while.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, that's right.
I completely forgot.

name: Gardner
message: Just sitting around at the Fish Scale Inn is only going to make my body sluggish. Until we can figure out a way to leave the village, I'll help out too.

name: Jonathan
message: Are you okay？
Your face is totally pale.

name: Cordelia
message: I'm sorry......
I'm fine, don't worry about me.

name: Jonathan
message: You shouldn't push yourself.
No one could possibly feel good after seeing something like that.
But why did Marsh end up like that？

name: Cordelia
message: No way, is it because we went around asking so many questions？
Did you seal Marsh's mouth so she wouldn't say anything unnecessary?

name: Cordelia
message: If that's the case, then Marsh-san was killed because of us.

name: Jonathan
message: Marsh blurted it out himself.
I might not be able to see it through to the end.

name: Jonathan
message: Maybe he already knew his time was up.
You knew that, and you still helped us.

name: Cordelia
message: Why would you do something so awful......

name: Cordelia
message: Don't push yourself too hard, okay?
ジョナサンが倒れでもしたら、わたしのせいじゃない　　　　　　　　かと心配するわ。

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong？
You look kinda sick though........

name: Jonathan
message: That's not true, it's okay.
I'm just a little tired, that's all.

name: Gardner
message: It's not good for a young guy to be like that.
Save the whining about being tired for when you're way older.

name: Cordelia
message: Are you really okay？
If you're not feeling well, you can rest upstairs if you want.

name: Jonathan
message: いや、結構だ。
I have a lot of places I gotta go today.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, you remember the promise you made to me, right？

name: Jonathan
message: Promise？
What was it again.

name: Cordelia
message: わたしがどうしてアーカムに連れてこられたのか調べ　　　　　　　　てくれるって約束したじゃないの。

name: Jonathan
message: そうだった、すっかり忘れてたよ。
Let's check that out today too.

name: Cordelia
message: Who are you planning to ask？
I wonder if there's anyone who knows stuff like that.
Go outside
Go upstairs
